job.title: Software Engineer - New Grad
job.description: ixl learning a leading edtech company with products used by million students worldwide is seeking new graduates who have a passion for technology and education you will dive into our code base and immediately contribute to our three extremely impactful educational products and build new innovative products you can finetune your existing skills and learn new ones as you work on one of our many teams youll be able to work with our core technology team in backend engineering frontend group using cuttingedge technologies like react mobile team in implementing ios and android apps or our fullstack teams who seek engineers interested in doing it allltbrgtltbrgtwe find it immensely satisfying to develop products that impact the lives of millions and we are eager to have you join our teamltbrgtltbrgtinternational candidates encouraged to apply hb sponsorship is availableltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtwhat youll be doingltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtas a software engineer you will build the backend wiring application logic and ui that engage our users you will find and use the best technologies to add features and create new products youll be involved in all aspects of the development process including design coding testing debugging and tuning you will own your projects from start to end as they travel through our fastpaced development cycle in addition to working with your fellow engineers youll collaborate with other teams to design amazing products that meet the needs of our users who are students and teachers all over the worldltbrgtltbrgttechnologyltbrgtltbrgtour serverside stack currently includes linux apache java scala python and oracle for our ios app development we use swift our frontend code is written in javascript including the react and d libraries and es of course the specific technologies and languages you use will vary by project and according to your own interests or specialization areasltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtwhat were looking forltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligtbachelors or advanced degree in computer science or a related disciplineltligtltligtexcellent programming skillsltligtltligtstrong analyticalreasoning and problemsolving skillsltligtltligtability to work both independently and with a wide variety of teamsltligtltligtknowledge of unix python java sql or javascript is a plusltligtltligtpassion for improving education through technologyltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtltugtabout ixl learningltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtixl learning is a leading educational technology company on a big mission creating innovative learning experiences that help all learners reach their full potential ixls comprehensive curriculum and insightful analytics help more than teachers deliver personalized instruction and empower over million students to achieve new learning milestones every dayltbrgtltbrgtat ixl were passionate about our mission of creating the best educational technology that improves learning for all students we bring that same passion to creating a workplace that values diversity on the basis that all of us bring a unique perspective and experience that advances ixls missionltbrgtltbrgtwe value diversity in age race ethnicity gender sexual orientation physical and mental ability political and religious beliefs and life experience and we are proud to promote a work environment where everyone from any background can do their best work ixl learning is an equal opportunity employer
